snippet.title: Grimshire (Pre-alpha Trailer)
snippet.description:
You’ve barely escaped the chaos that consumed your hometown overnight. The friendly residents of Grimshire, an isolated mountain village, offer you a new home. Restore the cozy old farmhouse, and tend the fields. But beware, the plague is coming. The community must work together if they are to survive. 
https://store.steampowered.com/app/2238470/Grimshire/
